info.title: Lender API
info.description: Manages lenders and their related rules.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to return all lenders.

get.description:
Fetch a paginated list of all lenders.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

post.description:
Create a new lender.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

get.description:
Get the details for a single lender.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

put.description:
Update a lenders information.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Remove a lender from the system.

Requires the lender_remover role to access.

get.summary: Get all of a lenders allocations
get.description:
Returns a paginated list of all allocations for a lender. Can be filtered by date to return the currently active allocation.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

post.description:
Create a new lender allocation.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a specific lender allocation.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

put.description:
Update a lenders allocation.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Removes a lender allocation from the system.

Requires the lender_remover role to access.

get.description:
Fetches a paginated list of all lender types.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

post.description:
Create a new lender type.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetches a single lender type.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

put.description:
Updates a lender type record.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Delete a lender type.

Requires the lender_remover role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a paginated list of all bandings for a lender type.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to return all bandings.

post.description:
Creates a new lender type banding.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

get.summary: Fetch a banding for a lender type
get.description:
Fetch a single banding for a lender type.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

put.description:
Updates a lender type banding.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Deletes a lender type banding.

Requires the lender_remover role to access.
